original_text: As I entered into judgment with your fathers in the wilderness of the land of Egypt, so I will enter into judgment with you, declares the Lord God.
korean_text: 내가 애굽 땅 광야에서 너희 조상들을 심판한 것 같이 너희를 심판하리라 주 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: As I entered into judgment with your fathers
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희 조상들과 심판에 들어갔던 것처럼

sentences.original_text: in the wilderness of the land of Egypt
so I will enter into judgment with you
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 같이 내가 너희와 심판에 들어가리라
